nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Automate Google Analytics Reporting - AlexK1919

## Overview
Automated workflow: Automate Google Analytics Reporting - AlexK1919. This workflow integrates 8 different services: stickyNote, code, scheduleTrigger, googleAnalytics, set. It contains 29 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 29
- **Node Types**: 8
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Get Page Engagement Stats for this week**: googleAnalytics
- **Get Page Engagement Stats for prior week**: googleAnalytics
- **Get Google Search Results for this week**: googleAnalytics
- **Get Country views data for this week**: googleAnalytics
- **Sticky Note4**: stickyNote
- **Aggregate Data**: code
- **Get Google Search Results for prior week**: googleAnalytics
- ... and 19 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
